AUCT.BK.summary: Union Auction Public Company Limited provides auction services for assets in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Vehicle Auction, Motorcycle Auction, Transportation, and Others. It is involved in the auction of automobiles, motorcycles, land and houses, shares, furniture, electric appliances, 5G spectrums, phone numbers, obsolete equipment, and brand-name products. The company also offers vehicle transfer and price estimate services; and AUCT Live, which supports online auction by displaying live video and audio from the auction site in real time. It operates 13 auction venues, as well as offers mobile auction services. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BIG-R.BK.long_name: Big Camera Corporation Public Company Limited
BIG-R.BK.summary: Big Camera Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes cameras and photography-related products in Thailand. The company offers digital cameras, lens, action cameras/360 cameras, VDOs, drones, instant cameras/instant films, camera bags, straps, flashes, gimbal stabilizers, broadcast accessories, tripods, memory cards, filters, printers, binoculars, batteries, and others. It also provides mobile phones, and photography and mobile phone related products; and related services, including photographic processing and photographic equipment repair services, etc. In addition, the company is involved in the printing business. It operates approximately 200 branches. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

JMART-R.BK.summary: Jay Mart Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of mobile phones and related accessories in Thailand. It is involved in the retail and wholesale of mobile and accessories; debts management and collection and insurance broker business; rental space management business; and shopping centre and property development business. The company also offers leasing and retail loans, revolving and term loans, and factoring services; and software development services. In addition, it engages in the food and beverage business under the Casa Lapin coffee brand; insurance broking business; non-performing debt management business; and non-life insurance business. Further, the company acts as the sales agent or distributor of subscriber identification module (SIM) card packages and prepaid SIM cards of mobile phone operators through various distribution channels. Jay Mart Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MPG.BK.summary: MPG Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an entertainment retailer in Thailand. The company produces and distributes technology equipment and cosmetics, as well as music and movie in the form of CDs, DVDs, and blu-rays; and acquires copyrights for music and movies. It is also involved in the renewal energy business. The company was formerly known as Mangpong 1989 Public Company Limited and changed its name to MPG Corporation Public Company Limited in October 2015. MPG Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PTG-R.BK.summary: PTG Energy Public Company Limited trades in petroleum products, gas products, and supplies and equipment for oil service stations in Thailand. The company also trades in consumable products; and operates petrol stations. Its fuel products include diesel and gasoline. The company also trades in food and beverages; operates convenience stores under the Max Mart name; coffee shops under the Pun Thai Coffee and Coffee World, ice-cream shops under the Cream & Fudge name; restaurants under the Thai Chef express; and sandwich shop under the New York 5th Av. Deli name. In addition, it is involved in the production and trading of ethanol; transportation of fuel; manufacturing of biogas, and biomass power plants, and other types of power plants; provision of construction services; operation of tank farms and service stations; and car service center. Further, the company develops communication tools equipment; provides e-money services, electronic money transfer, payment facility, and bill payment services, as well as provides support services to the issuer or recipient of the electronic card or the seller of goods or services. The company was formerly known as Paktai Chueplerng Company Limited. PTG Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TWZ-R.BK.summary: TWZ Corporation Public Company Limited primarily engages in communication equipment trading business in Thailand. It operates through Communication Equipment Trading, Real Estate Development, Generate and Selling Electricity Plasma, and Investment Property segments. The company distributes mobile phones, spare parts, SIM and pre-paid cards, and related accessories; and operates as a service center of telecommunication equipment. It also provides counter services for payment of service fee of mobile phones; develops and rents real estate projects; and generates and sells electricity through renewable energy. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
